Name: King's Squire
Title: Teachings of the Forest: King's Squire
Desc: A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It has taken on the shape of a bow.\n"Remember, this whole world is but a dream of the forest... Please pass on the forest's language and the responsibility of protecting the King's land to future successors."

Talent.Name: King's Squire
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Character deals +1 DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When played: </color>During this Round, the next time you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character using an Elemental Skill, spend 2 fewer Elemental Dice.\n(Only <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#3202}Bow Characters</color> can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon.)
